Description:
Model
Brand: Rosewill
Model: Helium NAS


Details
Type: ATX Mid Tower
Color: Black
Case Material: Steel / Plastic
With Power Supply: No
Power Supply Mounted: Bottom
Motherboard Compatibility: ATX / ITX / Micro ATX
Side Panel Window: Mesh
Dust Filters: Yes


Expansion
Internal 3.5" Drive Bays: 10
Internal 2.5" Drive Bays: 3
Expansion Slots: 7


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: 1 x USB 3.1 Type-C / 2 x USB 3.0 / Audio


Cooling System
Fan Options: Front: 3 x 120mm, 3 x 140mm (3x 140mm Included)
Top: 3 x 120mm, 2 x 140mm
Rear: 1x 120mm, 1 x 140mm (1 x 140mm Included)
Radiator Options: Front: 360mm / 280mm / 240mm
Top: 360mm / 280mm / 240mm
Rear: 120mm


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 280 mm
Max CPU Cooler Height: 180 mm
Max PSU Length: 200 mm


Additional Info
Features: High-Airflow with All Mesh Panels:  Three mesh panels provide massive airflow to your system, ensuring maximum cooling performance.
 
Cable Management System:  A roomy 26mm of space behind the motherboard allows for quick and easy routing of all your major cables, keeping your build clean and organized.
 
Included 4x 140mm PWM Fan
 
Expansive Storage for Your Home Server: Designed to support thirteen hard drives, offering plenty of storage for all your gaming and data needs
 
Modern Front Panel I/O: Features a USB 3.1 Type-C port, USB 3.0 port
Label: Chasis Rosewill Helium NAS Black
